languages.text: {n}Но кибермастиф не реагирует. Алые угольки визоров смотрят на Соломона, и ни одна мышца под темной шкурой не дрогает в ответ на приказ покинуть хозяина.{/n}
{n}But the cyber-mastiff does not react. The scarlet lights of his visors stare at Solomorne, and not a muscle beneath the dark coat quivers in response to the order to leave his master.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Но кибермастиф не реагирует. Алые угольки визоров смотрят на Соломона, и ни одна мышца под темной шкурой не дрогает в ответ на приказ покинуть хозяина.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}But the cyber-mastiff does not react. The scarlet lights of his visors stare at Solomorne, and not a muscle beneath the dark coat quivers in response to the order to leave his master.{/n}
{n}But the cyber-mastiff does not react. The scarlet lights of his visors stare at Solomorne, and not a muscle beneath the dark coat quivers in response to the order to leave his master.{/n}
{n}But the cyber-mastiff does not react. The scarlet lights of his visors stare at Solomorne, and not a muscle beneath the dark coat quivers in response to the order to leave his master.{/n}
{n}But the cyber-mastiff does not react. The scarlet lights of his visors stare at Solomorne, and not a muscle beneath the dark coat quivers in response to the order to leave his master.{/n}
{n}But the cyber-mastiff does not react. The scarlet lights of his visors stare at Solomorne, and not a muscle beneath the dark coat quivers in response to the order to leave his master.{/n}

languages.text: {n}しかし、サイバーマスチフは反応しなかった。彼のバイザーに灯る深紅の光はソロモーンをじっと見据えていた。暗い毛並みの下にある筋肉は、主人から離れるように命じられても、一筋の震えすら見せなかった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}But the cyber-mastiff does not react. The scarlet lights of his visors stare at Solomorne, and not a muscle beneath the dark coat quivers in response to the order to leave his master.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}しかし、サイバーマスチフは反応しなかった。彼のバイザーに灯る深紅の光はソロモーンをじっと見据えていた。暗い毛並みの下にある筋肉は、主人から離れるように命じられても、一筋の震えすら見せなかった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Aber der Cyber-Mastiff reagiert nicht. Die violetten Lichter seiner Visoren starren Solomorne an, und kein Muskel unter dem dunklen Fell vibriert als Reaktion auf den Befehl, seinen Herren zu verlassen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}But the cyber-mastiff does not react. The scarlet lights of his visors stare at Solomorne, and not a muscle beneath the dark coat quivers in response to the order to leave his master.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Aber der Cyber-Mastiff reagiert nicht. Die violetten Lichter seiner Visoren starren Solomorne an, und kein Muskel unter dem dunklen Fell vibriert als Reaktion auf den Befehl, seinen Herren zu verlassen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Mais le cyber-mastiff ne réagit pas. L'ordre direct ne déclenche pas le moindre frémissement chez le cyber-mastiff dont les visières écarlates restent rivées sur le visage de son maître.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}But the cyber-mastiff does not react. The scarlet lights of his visors stare at Solomorne, and not a muscle beneath the dark coat quivers in response to the order to leave his master.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Mais le cyber-mastiff ne réagit pas. L'ordre direct ne déclenche pas le moindre frémissement chez le cyber-mastiff dont les visières écarlates restent rivées sur le visage de son maître.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pero el cibermastín no reacciona. Las luces escarlata de sus visores están fijas en Solomorne, y bajo su oscura pelambrera no se mueve un solo músculo para responder a la orden de abandonar a su amo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}But the cyber-mastiff does not react. The scarlet lights of his visors stare at Solomorne, and not a muscle beneath the dark coat quivers in response to the order to leave his master.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pero el cibermastín no reacciona. Las luces escarlata de sus visores están fijas en Solomorne, y bajo su oscura pelambrera no se mueve un solo músculo para responder a la orden de abandonar a su amo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}然而，他的生化獒犬没有任何反应。格雷托的面甲闪烁着红光，直视着索罗蒙。尽管索罗蒙下了命令，要格雷托离开它的主人，但格雷托却一动不动。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}But the cyber-mastiff does not react. The scarlet lights of his visors stare at Solomorne, and not a muscle beneath the dark coat quivers in response to the order to leave his master.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}然而，他的生化獒犬没有任何反应。格雷托的面甲闪烁着红光，直视着索罗蒙。尽管索罗蒙下了命令，要格雷托离开它的主人，但格雷托却一动不动。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ne var ki siber mastif tepki vermiyor. Vizörlerinin kızıl ışıkları Solomorne'a bakarken almış olduğu efendisini terk etme emri karşısında koyu renkli kürkünün altındaki tek bir kas bile kıpırdamıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}But the cyber-mastiff does not react. The scarlet lights of his visors stare at Solomorne, and not a muscle beneath the dark coat quivers in response to the order to leave his master.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ne var ki siber mastif tepki vermez. Vizörlerinin kızıl ışıkları Solomorne'a bakarken almış olduğu efendisi terk etme emri karşısında koyu renkli paltosunun altındaki tek bir kas bile kıpırdamaz.{/n}
